product_name: Beekman 1802Travel Size Micellar Milk Froth Cleansing Gel & Makeup Remover
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeSustainable PackagingGive BackBeekman 1802 Micellar Milk Froth Cleansing Gel & Makeup Remover removes heavy makeup and dirt in one step, while replenishing the skin with 92 minerals.
details: DetailsBenefits2-in-1 formula removes long-wear makeup and impurities, double cleansing in one easy stepReplenishes 92 minerals from golden sea mossGoat milk saponins and micelles are gentler than traditional harsh surfactantsNon-drying, non-irritatingSuitable for all skin typesSafe for sensitive skin and eyesCertified microbiome friendlyKey IngredientsMillions of Micelles: Lift away impurities and long-wear makeupFormulated without fragrance, parabens, sulfates, mineral oil, alcoholResearch Results100% of impurities removed without residue or irritation9 out of 10 people prefer Micellar Milk Froth over micellar waterItem 2634937How To UseApply a dime-sized amount to hands, add water and rub together to create a frothy lather. Gently massage onto face, focusing on areas with makeup. Rinse and pat dry.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Propanediol, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Acrylates Copolymer, Decyl Glucoside, Caprae Lac (Goat Milk), Sodium Hyaluronate, Chondrus Crispus (Golden Sea Moss) Extract, Sodium Chloride, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Lysine, Sodium Glycolate, Sodium Benzoate, Cocamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Betula Alba (Birch) Bark Extract, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Carbonate, Iron Oxides CI 77492, Dextrin, Clitoria Ternatea Flower Extract, Silica ... and Kindness.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply a dime-sized amount to hands, add water and rub together to create a frothy lather. Gently massage onto face, focusing on areas with makeup. Rinse and pat dry.
